flawed_nl_solution:
John was 39-3=<<39-3=40>>40 years old 3 years ago
So that means in 6 years James will be 40/2=<<40/2=20>>20 years old
So right now James is 20-6=<<20-6=14>>14 years old
So James's older brother is 14+4=<<14+4=18>>18 years old
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
